feed.title: The legal risks of auto-updating wallet software; custodial relationships

entry.title: The legal risks of auto-updating wallet software; custodial relationships
entry.summary: Tamas Blummer pointed out that it is harder for users to reclaim funds taken by a wallet provider if they are not in the provider's jurisdiction. This is because the legal hurdle to force confiscation through a wallet provider might be lower if the target user is not domestic. Justus had previously made a statement that was contrary to this. No further information or context was provided.
